name: Wacko Combat
description:
DESCRIPTION

Discover the epic power of Crazy Mongoose and marvel at her journey towards fulfilling her fate as an undisputed Wacko Master.  At the klick of a button, slay your opponents using skill and funky moves.

WACKO WHAT?

The combat mechanics are based on Rock, Paper Scissors. Similar to the original game, after five seconds you and the opponent choose a Move with the goal of defeating each other. But in this game throughout the countdown you can see your opponent's selection change between the sequence of the three Moves. 

Is the Move selection completely random?

NO. The Moves are arranged in a fixed sequence for both the player and the PC. Just focus on the tempo and you will get it (;

CONTROLS

[SPACE]- Switch between the sequence of three Moves: Rock Paper Scissors.

NOTES

This is the first game I made. It was done as part of a Student project in Indie Game Design and Programming course. It was a very exciting process and I am very happy to share it online. There are a few more changes and improvements that I am currently working on and will update in the near future. 

Many thanks to the Department of Visual Communication at Bezalel Academy and especially: Dani Bacon, Idan Rooze and Jasmine Nackash who had guided me throughout the process.
